name: Escape_Infection
description: A plugin which runs the Escape Infection game-mode and tooling.
author: Critical Floof

Restricted Role.description: Restricts players with this role from using some commands that can be spammed. Example: /msg

Trusted Role.description: Allows players with this role to utilize commands with elevated permissions.

Developer Role.description: Same as Trusted role but with the addition of potentially dangerous commands, which is locked behind the safety command /dev_enable

Map Time Length.description: The time a map has (in minutes) before a vote is called to switch the map

Autosave Interval.description: The time it takes (in minutes) every autosave occurs

Verbose Logging.description: Extra console logging for debug purposes.
